testcase.name: Recuruitment page field validation
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to the Dashboard page by logging in Hireprous page......passed When User clicks on Recruitment from top menu..............................passed Then User will be redirected to Recruitment process page....................passed And User clicks on Job Request menu.........................................passed Then User will be redirected to the JOb Request list page successfully......passed And User verifies fields on the Job Request list page.......................passed

testcase.name: Recruitment field and error message validation
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Job Request page...........................................passed When User clicks on New Job Request button..................................passed Then User will be redirected to Add job request page........................passed And User verifies fields on add job request page............................passed And User clicks on the Save button without entering the mandatory fields and verifies error meassage.passed

testcase.name: Filling Job Request creation
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to the Recruitment page by logging in Hireprous page....passed When User clicks on Recruitment from top...................................passed Then User will redirected to Recruitment process page.......................passed And User clicks on Job Request tab..........................................passed And User clicks on the new Job Request button...............................passed And User has to fill the details of Customer Name, Recruitment Role, Business Unit, No. of Openings, Location, Currency Type, Pay Range, Pay Frequency, Employment Type, Project Start Date, Placement For, Remote Working, Recruiter, Email, Firstname, Lastname, Location, Pay Range, Contract Duration,Job Description, Mandatory Skills, Optional Skills and save the Job request.passed

testcase.name: Login page field validation
testcase.system-out: Given User navigate to Hireprous page.......................................passed When user verifies Hireprous logo...........................................passed And User verifies login page fields.........................................passed

testcase.name: Login to application with Invalid user credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Hireprous page.........................................passed When User enters invalid username and password..............................passed And User clicks on the Log IN button........................................passed Then User verifes the error message for invalid credentials.................passed

testcase.name: Login to application with valid user credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Hireprous login page.......................................passed When User enters username and password......................................passed And User clicks on Log IN button............................................passed Then User login must be successful..........................................passed
